founders.title: Meet the Mind Behind ITOTECH
founders.subtitle: Driven by a passion for education and a vision for the future of technology in Africa.

items.name: Ijagun Itothe Joy
items.bio: I founded ITOTECH with a simple belief: that technology is the great equalizer. Our goal isn't just to teach code, but to unlock the boundless potential within every young person who walks through our doors.

items.quote: I recently participated in the ITOTECH Fusion 360 tutorial, which provided a solid introduction to the software. The course covered the basics of the interface, basic sketching techniques, and an introduction to 3D modeling. I found the lessons on creating simple sketches and transforming them into 3D models especially helpful. The tutorial was well-structured, making complex tools easy to understand, and the hands-on practice helped me gain confidence with the software. Overall, it was a great learning experience that has laid a strong foundation for further exploration of Fusion 360.
items.author: OKUSANYA SAMUEL AYODEJI

items.quote: The tutors are top-notch, and the breakdown of each part is in-depth. They care not only about the tutorials, but about each student’s individual understanding —which is one thing I really like about Itotech.
items.author: OG Moses
